text_126.en: Tabs in user interfaces facilitate seamless navigation between app sections. Positioned in the AppBar, they offer labeled or icon-based selection, enabling users to switch content effortlessly. Consistent styling and clear hierarchy enhances the overall user experience, ensuring intuitive navigation within the application.

text_130.en: Add a tabs into your app using the `addTabs` method like this:

text_137.en: Default Tab variant for mobile screens is `fullWidth` unless provided.

text_140.en: Here are the available setter and getter properties of the Tabs Component.

text_199.en: Here are the available methods of the Tabs Component.

text_201.en: Sets a callback function when the value of the tab changes.

text_205.en: Add a callback function when a tab item i click.

text_213.en: Add or insert a tab to the Tabs Component.

text_219.en: Sets a new title for the corresponding tab.

text_224.en: Sets an icon to a corresponding tab title.

text_229.en: Removes a tab item by its corresponding index.

text_233.en: Removes a tab item by its corresponding name.

text_237.en: Removes the first item in the tabs list. This will return the item being removed.

text_241.en: Removes the last item in the tabs list. This will return the item being removed.

text_245.en: Returns the layout of the corresponding tab. You can then add components into the returned layout.

text_250.en: Show a tab panel by its corresponding name. This will make the tab in active state.

text_254.en: Show a tab panel by its corresponding name. This will make the tab in active state.

text_258.en: Enable or disable a tab item. Pass `index` as number if you want the corresponding tab index to be enabled or disabled.

text_259.en: Pass `index` as Boolean, if you want to disable the entire Tabs component.

text_264.en: Get the enabled state of a tab.

text_269.en: Enable or disable a tab by its name.

text_274.en: Get the enabled state of a tab by its name.

text_279.en: Determines the behavior of scroll buttons when tabs are set to `scrollable`.

text_283.en: Get the index of the corresponding layout.

text_287.en: Adds a callback function on right click.

text_291.en: Sets the corner radius of the tab.

text_299.en: Add a custom styling to the indicator color.

text_305.en: Sets the padding of the tab items.

text_32.en: Adds a callback function on right click.

text_41.en: Sets the size of the component.

text_58.en: Sets the x and y scaling of the component.

text_63.en: Returns the position of the component. The return object is of the form `{left, top, right, bottom}`

text_68.en: Sets the margin of the component.

text_76.en: Sets the padding of the component's container.

text_84.en: Sets the position of the component relative to its parent dimensions.

text_90.en: Sets the border line for the component container.

text_99.en: Sets the corner radius of the component.

text_107.en: Bring this component forward by a given z-index.

text_111.en: Bring this component backward by a given z-index.
